articles.title: About
articles.description: *Data is the new oil, and analytics is the combustion engine* - Sondergaard
articles.contents:
Hello! This is Dewi Amaliah, your data analyst-in-residence and the
woman behind this blog.
I am a data nerd currently studying as a graduate student of Master
of Business Analytics, Department of Econometric and Business Statistics
at Monash University. Prior to being a student, I was working in
Statistics Indonesia.
I created this blog as a space for learning and sharing knowledge and
information related to data analytics. It is a place where I and my
fellow data nerds can discuss the interesting phenomenon around us
through data. I mainly use R in R studio in wrangling, visualizing,
modeling, and analyzing the data. I also used GitHub for the
reproducibility of my analysis.
I would love to talk with my fellow data nerds. Let me know how we
can catch up by dropping me a DM in my twitter here.
Until then, enjoy the blog!

articles.title: Dewi Amaliah
articles.description: Welcome to my website. I hope you enjoy it.
